##### FILE: cron_job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/helloworld:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: helloworld
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - date; echo 'Hello World';
            image: busybox
            name: task
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '*/15 * * * *'

---

##### FILE: cron_job1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/db-backup-cron-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: db-backup-cron-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - echo 'performing db backup...' && sleep 20
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            image: busybox
            name: backup
          restartPolicy: Never
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'

---

##### FILE: cron_pvc.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/scheduler:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: scheduler
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - backup_script.py
            command:
            - python
            image: alterhoodie/momonish:latest
            name: cc
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /data
              name: data-volume
            - mountPath: /app/secrets
              name: google-drive-secret-volume
          imagePullSecrets:
          - name: my-registry-secret
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: data-volume
            persistentVolumeClaim:
              claimName: my-pvc
          - name: google-drive-secret-volume
            secret:
              secretName: google-drive-secrets
  schedule: '* * * * *'

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: cron_sample.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/hello:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: hello
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster
            image: busybox:1.28
            imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
            name: hello
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '* * * * *'

---

##### FILE: cron_script_deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/cron-script-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    db: pgsql
  name: cron-script-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: cron-script-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: cron-script-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PL_JWT_SIGNING_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: jwt-signing-key
              name: cloud-auth-secrets
        - name: PL_POSTGRES_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PL_POSTGRES_USERNAME
              name: pl-db-secrets
        - name: PL_POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PL_POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: pl-db-secrets
        - name: PL_DATABASE_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-key
              name: pl-db-secrets
        - name: PL_VZMGR_SERVICE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PL_VZMGR_SERVICE
              name: pl-service-config
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-db-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-tls-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-domain-config
        image: cloud-cron_script_server_image
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 50700
            scheme: HTTPS
        name: cron-script-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 50700
          name: http2
        - containerPort: 50701
          name: metrics-http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 50700
            scheme: HTTPS
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 10100
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: certs
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 10100
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      volumes:
      - name: certs
        secret:
          secretName: service-tls-certs

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/cron-script-server

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/cron-script-server failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/cron-script-server failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

kind: Deployment

        - name: PL_POSTGRES_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PL_POSTGRES_USERNAME
              name: pl-db-secrets
        - name: PL_POSTGRES_PASSWORD

            name: pl-db-config

            name: pl-tls-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-domain-config

        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 50700
            scheme: HTTPS
        name: cron-script-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 50700
          name: http2
        - containerPort: 50701
          name: metrics-http

          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 50700

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 10100

            type: RuntimeDefault

          name: certs

        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 10100

          type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/addwork:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: addwork
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      backoffLimit: 2
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - python3
            - add_tasks.py
            env:
            - name: REDIS_HOST
              value: redis-0.redis-service
            - name: PYTHONUNBUFFERED
              value: "1"
            image: docker.io/wdenniss/pi_worker:2
            name: pi-container
          restartPolicy: Never
  schedule: '*/5 * * * *'

            - echo
            - step3

            - echo
            - hello
            image: alpine
            name: prepare

  schedule: 0 0 * * *

kind: CronJob

  namespace: default

      template:

            norbjd.github.io/kueueleuleu: "true"

          containers:

            - --

  namespace: default

  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      backoffLimit: 0
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - python3
            - train.py
            image: trainer:0.2
            name: train-container
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /mnt/sharedfolder
              name: nfs-direct-volume
          restartPolicy: Never
          volumes:
          - name: nfs-direct-volume
            persistentVolumeClaim:
              claimName: nfs-direct-pvc
  schedule: '*/5 * * * *'

---

##### FILE: cronjob_v1_hello.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/cronjob-sample:
apiVersion: cronjob.tutorial.kubebuilder.io/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: cronjob
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: cronjob-sample
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: cronjob
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: cronjob
  name: cronjob-sample
  namespace: default
spec:
  concurrencyPolicy: Allow
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster
            image: busybox
            name: hello
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'
  startingDeadlineSeconds: 60

---

spec:

      creationTimestamp: null

      activeDeadlineSeconds: 12
      template:
        metadata:
          creationTimestamp: null
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster
            image: busybox
            name: busybox
            resources: {}
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'
status: {}

---

##### FILE: cropper.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/cropper:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: cropper
  name: cropper
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cropper
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cropper
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
              name: grid-aws-access-token
        - name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
              name: grid-aws-access-token
        - name: PLAY_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: play-secret
              name: grid-play-secret
        image: eu.gcr.io/grid-301122/cropper:containerised
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /management/healthcheck
            port: 9000
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
        name: cropper
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /management/healthcheck
            port: 9000
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/gu
          name: gu-config
        - mountPath: /etc/grid
          name: grid-config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: gu
        name: gu-config
      - configMap:
          name: grid
        name: grid-config

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: public
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/private:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: private
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

##### FILE: crud.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/crud:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: crud
  name: crud
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: MYSQL_USER
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: MYSQL_USER
          name: db-secret
    - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          name: db-secret
    - name: MYSQL_DB
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: MYSQL_DATABASE
          name: db-config
    - name: MYSQL_PORT
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: MYSQL_PORT
          name: db-config
    - name: MYSQL_HOST
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: MYSQL_HOST
          name: db-config
    image: gulcantopcu/ckad-crud:latest
    imagePullPolicy: Always
    name: crud
    ports:
    - containerPort: 5000
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 200m
        memory: 256Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 2m
        memory: 21Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/crudapp-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: crudapp
  name: crudapp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: crudapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: crudapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: db-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: db-secret
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_HOST
              name: db-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PORT
              name: db-configmap
        - name: MYSQL_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DB
              name: db-configmap
        image: mateusz1982/kubernetes_demo:crudapp_image
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: crudapp-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

##### FILE: cryptletter.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to core/Deployment/cryptletter-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: cryptletter-deployment
  namespace: core
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cryptletter
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cryptletter
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: REDIS__ADDRESS
          value: redis-service:6379
        - name: APP__LOG_LEVEL
          value: "4"
        - name: REDIS__PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_PASSWORD
              name: redis
        image: scribblerockerz/cryptletter:3.1.5
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /favicon.ico
            port: crypt-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: cryptletter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: crypt-port
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /favicon.ico
            port: crypt-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsGroup: 10001
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 10001

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to core/Ingress/cryptletter-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:

    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: zerossl-clusterissuer
    cert-manager.io/duration: 3600h
  name: cryptletter-ingress
  namespace: core
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: cryptletter.navkrish.net
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: cryptletter-service
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /

    - cryptletter.navkrish.net

##### FILE: cs548-site-script.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/cs548-site-script:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  build_cs548_site.sh: |
    #!/bin/sh
    apt update && apt install -y git wget
    wget https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.111.3/hugo_extended_0.111.3_linux-amd64.deb
    dpkg -i hugo_extended_0.111.3_linux-amd64.deb
    cd /hy548_repo
    rm -rf /hy548_repo/hy548
    rm -rf /cs548-site/*
    git clone https://github.com/chazapis/hy548
    cd /hy548_repo/hy548 && git submodule init && git submodule update
    cd /hy548_repo/hy548/html && hugo -D
    rm -rf /cs548-site/*
    mv /hy548_repo/hy548/html/public/* /cs548-site
  git_refresh.sh: |
    #!/bin/sh
    apt update && apt install -y git wget
    cd /hy548_repo/hy548
    ls -al
    local_head =$(git rev-parse HEAD)
    remote_head=$(git rev-parse @{u})

    echo "Local head: $local_head"
    echo "Remote head: $remote_head"
    cat .git/refs/heads/main
    if [ "$local_head" != "$remote_head" ]; then
      git pull
      wget https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.111.3/hugo_extended_0.111.3_linux-amd64.deb
      dpkg -i hugo_extended_0.111.3_linux-amd64.deb
      cd html && hugo -D
      rm -rf /cs548-site/*
      mv /hy548_repo/hy548/html/public/* /cs548-site
      echo "Changes detected and updated"
    else
      echo "No changes"
    fi
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: cs548-site-script
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: cs-db-backup-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to <cs-db namespace>/Deployment/cs-db-backup:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: cs-db-backup
  namespace: <cs-db namespace>
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      foundationservices.cloudpak.ibm.com: cs-db-data
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        backup.velero.io/backup-volumes: cs-db-backup
        post.hook.backup.velero.io/command: '["sh", "-c", "rm -rf /cs-db/cs-db-backup/database"]'
        post.hook.restore.velero.io/command: '["sh", "-c", "/cs-db/br_cs-db.sh restore
          <cs-db namespace>"]'
        post.hook.restore.velero.io/exec-timeout: 300s
        post.hook.restore.velero.io/timeout: 720s
        post.hook.restore.velero.io/wait-timeout: 300s
        pre.hook.backup.velero.io/command: '["sh", "-c", "/cs-db/br_cs-db.sh backup
          <cs-db namespace>"]'
        pre.hook.backup.velero.io/timeout: 300s
      labels:
        foundationservices.cloudpak.ibm.com: cs-db-data
      name: cs-db-backup
      namespace: <cs-db namespace>
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - sleep infinity
        image: icr.io/cpopen/cpfs/cpfs-utils:4.3.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: cs-db-br
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            ephemeral-storage: 512Mi
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            ephemeral-storage: 128Mi
            memory: 256Mi
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cs-db/cs-db-backup
          name: cs-db-backup-mount
        - mountPath: /cs-db
          name: scripts
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccount: cs-db-backup-sa
      serviceAccountName: cs-db-backup-sa
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: cs-db-backup-mount
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: cs-db-backup-pvc
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 511
          name: cs-db-br-configmap
        name: scripts

---

        - -c

            ephemeral-storage: 128Mi
            memory: 256Mi

          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true

        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /cs-db/cs-db-backup
          name: cs-db-backup-mount
        - mountPath: /cs-db
          name: scripts
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccount: cs-db-backup-sa
      serviceAccountName: cs-db-backup-sa
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

          claimName: cs-db-backup-pvc
      - configMap:

          name: cs-db-br-configmap
        name: scripts

##### FILE: csi-carina-controller.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/csi-carina-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: csi-carina-provisioner
  name: csi-carina-provisioner
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-carina-provisioner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-carina-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi-carina.sock
        - --v=5
        - --timeout=150s
        - --leader-election=true
        - --retry-interval-start=500ms
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - --extra-create-metadata=true
        - --strict-topology=true
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/csi-provisioner:v3.4.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-provisioner
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi-carina.sock
        - --v=5
        - --timeout=150s
        - --leader-election
        - --retry-interval-start=500ms
        - --handle-volume-inuse-error=false
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/csi-resizer:v1.7.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-resizer
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi-carina.sock
        - --cert-dir=/certs
        - --metrics-addr=:8080
        - --webhook-addr=:8443
        command:
        - carina-controller
        env:
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: NODE_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/carina:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 65
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: csi-carina-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9808
          name: healthz
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /etc/carina/
          name: config
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: certs
      - args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi-carina.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/livenessprobe:v2.9.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: liveness-probe
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: carina-csi-controller
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: socket-dir
      - configMap:
          name: carina-csi-config
        name: config
      - name: certs
        secret:
          secretName: mutatingwebhook

---

##### FILE: csi-carina-controller_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/MutatingWebhookConfiguration/carina-hook:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: MutatingWebhookConfiguration
metadata:
  name: carina-hook
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  - v1beta1
  clientConfig:
    service:
      name: carina-controller
      namespace: kube-system
      path: /pod/mutate
      port: 443
  failurePolicy: Ignore
  matchPolicy: Exact
  name: pod-hook.carina.storage.io
  namespaceSelector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: carina.storage.io/webhook
      operator: NotIn
      values:
      - ignore
  objectSelector: {}
  reinvocationPolicy: Never
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - ""
    apiVersions:
    - v1
    operations:
    - CREATE
    resources:
    - pods
  sideEffects: NoneOnDryRun
  timeoutSeconds: 30

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: carina-admission-create
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      name: carina-admission-create
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=carina-controller,carina-controller.$(POD_NAMESPACE).svc
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --secret-name=mutatingwebhook
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.1.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: carina-csi-controller

      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=carina-hook
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-validating=false
        - --secret-name=mutatingwebhook

##### FILE: csi-carina-controller1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/csi-carina-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: csi-carina-provisioner
  name: csi-carina-provisioner
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-carina-provisioner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-carina-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --v=5
        - --timeout=150s
        - --leader-election=true
        - --retry-interval-start=500ms
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - --extra-create-metadata=true
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: unix:///csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/csi-provisioner:v3.4.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --v=5
        - --timeout=150s
        - --leader-election
        - --retry-interval-start=500ms
        - --handle-volume-inuse-error=false
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: unix:///csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/csi-resizer:v1.7.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-resizer
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --cert-dir=/certs
        - --metrics-addr=:8080
        - --webhook-addr=:8443
        command:
        - carina-controller
        env:
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: NODE_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/carina:e2e
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-carina-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /etc/carina/
          name: config
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: certs
      serviceAccountName: carina-csi-controller
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: socket-dir
      - configMap:
          name: carina-csi-config
        name: config
      - name: certs
        secret:
          secretName: mutatingwebhook

---

##### FILE: csi-carina-node.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/csi-carina-node:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: csi-carina-node
  name: csi-carina-node
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-carina-node
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-carina-node
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi-carina.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi.carina.com/csi-carina.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.7.0
        name: csi-node-driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi-carina.sock
        - --metrics-addr=:8080
        command:
        - carina-node
        env:
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/carina:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 65
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: csi-carina-node
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9808
          name: healthz
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 64Mi

            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: true

          name: socket-dir

          name: mountpoint-dir

          name: modules

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/csi-carina-node:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: csi-carina-node
  name: csi-carina-node
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-carina-node
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-carina-node
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi-carina.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi.carina.com/csi-carina.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.7.0
        name: csi-node-driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi-carina.sock
        - --metrics-addr=:8080
        command:
        - carina-node
        env:
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/carina:e2e
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 65
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: csi-carina-node
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9808
          name: healthz
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 64Mi

##### FILE: csi-controller3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/csi-carina-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: csi-carina-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: carina-csi-driver
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.11.0
    class: carina
    helm.sh/chart: carina-csi-driver-v0.11.0
    release: my-release
  name: csi-carina-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-carina-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-carina-controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: carina-csi-driver
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.11.0
        class: carina
        helm.sh/chart: carina-csi-driver-v0.11.0
        release: my-release
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --v=5
        - --timeout=15s
        - --leader-election
        - --worker-threads=40
        - --extra-create-metadata=true
        - --strict-topology=true
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: unix:///csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/csi-provisioner:v2.2.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-provisioner
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - -csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - -v=5
        - -leader-election
        - --retry-interval-start=500ms
        - -handle-volume-inuse-error=false
        - --timeout=150s
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: unix:///csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/csi-resizer:v1.5.0
        name: csi-resizer
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --probe-timeout=3s
        - --health-port=29602
        - --v=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: unix:///csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/livenessprobe:v2.7.0
        name: liveness-probe
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --cert-dir=/certs
        - --metrics-addr=:8080
        - --webhook-addr=:8443
        command:
        - carina-controller
        env:
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: NODE_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi-provisioner.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/carina/carina:v0.11.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-carina-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /etc/carina/
          name: config
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: certs
      hostNetwork: false
      serviceAccountName: carina-csi-controller
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/controlplane
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: socket-dir
      - configMap:
          name: my-release-csi-config
        name: config
      - name: certs
        secret:
          secretName: my-release-apiserver-cert

  name: csi-gce-pd-controller-leaderelection-binding
  namespace: gce-pd-csi-driver

  name: csi-gce-pd-leaderelection-role
subjects:
- kind: ServiceAccount
  name: csi-gce-pd-controller-sa

  labels:
    app: csi-carina-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: carina-csi-driver
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.11.0
    class: carina
    helm.sh/chart: carina-csi-driver-v0.11.0
    release: my-release
  name: carina.storage.io
  namespace: default
spec:
  attachRequired: false
  podInfoOnMount: true
  volumeLifecycleModes:
  - Persistent

##### FILE: csi-fluid-daemonset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to fluid-system/DaemonSet/csi-nodeplugin-fluid:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: csi-nodeplugin-fluid
  namespace: fluid-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-nodeplugin-fluid
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-nodeplugin-fluid
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/var/lib/kubelet/csi-plugins/fuse.csi.fluid.io/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/csi-plugins/fuse.csi.fluid.io/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/acs/csi-node-driver-registrar:v1.2.0
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - rm -rf /registration/fluid /registration/fuse.csi.fluid.io-reg.sock
        name: node-driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/
          name: kubelet-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --nodeid=$(NODE_ID)
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --v=5
        command:
        - /usr/bin/fluid-csi
        env:
        - name: NODE_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix://var/lib/kubelet/csi-plugins/fuse.csi.fluid.io/csi.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/fluid/fluid-csi:v0.1.0-23e985d
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: plugins
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: true
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /plugin
          name: plugin-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: kubelet-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/alluxio-mnt
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: fluid-src-dir
      hostNetwork: true
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-fluid-plugin
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: plugin-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/alluxio-mnt
          type: Directory
        name: fluid-src-dir
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: csi-fluid-provisioner_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/csi-fluid-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: csi-fluid-provisioner
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-fluid-provisioner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-fluid-provisioner
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
                operator: Exists
            weight: 1
      containers:
      - args:
        - --provisioner=fuse.csi.fluid.io
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=True
        - --volume-name-prefix=fluid
        - --strict-topology=true
        - --timeout=150s
        - --enable-leader-election=true
        - --leader-election-type=leases
        - --retry-interval-start=500ms
        - --v=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /socketDir/csi.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/acs/csi-provisioner:v1.4.0-aliyun
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: external-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /socketDir
          name: fluid-provisioner-dir
      - args:
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --v=2
        - --driver=fuse.csi.fluid.io
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix://socketDir/csi.sock
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/fluid/fluid-csi:v0.1.0-5b5a67d
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-fluid-provisioner
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /dev
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: host-dev
        - mountPath: /var/log/
          name: host-log
        - mountPath: /socketDir/
          name: fluid-provisioner-dir
        - mountPath: /host/etc
          name: etc
      hostNetwork: true
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      serviceAccountName: admin
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: fluid-provisioner-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: host-log
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: host-dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc
        name: etc

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-attacher_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-attacher:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpath-attacher
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpath-attacher
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-attacher
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpath-attacher
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - csi-hostpathplugin
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-attacher:v1.2.0
        name: csi-attacher
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-attacher
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-attacher3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-attacher:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: attacher
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-attacher
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-attacher
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: attacher
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-attacher
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-attacher
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: attacher
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-attacher
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-attacher:v4.4.3
        name: csi-attacher
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-attacher
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-attacher5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-attacher:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpath-attacher
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpath-attacher
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-attacher
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpath-attacher
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - csi-hostpathplugin
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-attacher:v3.1.0
        name: csi-attacher
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-attacher
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

##### FILE: csi-hostpathplugin.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/csi-hostpathplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpathplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpathplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpathplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath-v0/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/driver-registrar:v0.4.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/hostpathplugin:v0.4.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: hostpath
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: mountpoint-dir
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath-v0
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mountpoint-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-plugin10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: plugin
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpathplugin
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpathplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: plugin
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpathplugin
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpathplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: plugin
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpathplugin
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --drivername=hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        - --v=5
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.12.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: hostpath
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: mountpoint-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: plugins-dir
        - mountPath: /csi-data-dir
          name: csi-data-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --health-port=9898
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/livenessprobe:v2.11.0
        name: liveness-probe
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --leader-election
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-external-health-monitor-controller:v0.10.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-external-health-monitor-controller
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.9.3
        name: node-driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
        - mountPath: /csi-data-dir
          name: csi-data-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-external-health-monitor-controller
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mountpoint-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins
          type: Directory
        name: plugins-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/csi-hostpath-data/
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: csi-data-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
        name: dev-dir

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: plugin
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpathplugin
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpathplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: plugin
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpathplugin
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpathplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: plugin
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpathplugin
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --drivername=hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        - --v=5
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.12.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: hostpath
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP

          privileged: true

          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: mountpoint-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: plugins-dir
        - mountPath: /csi-data-dir

        - --leader-election
        env:

          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-external-health-monitor-controller:v0.10.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-external-health-monitor-controller
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.9.3
        name: node-driver-registrar

          privileged: true

          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
        - mountPath: /csi-data-dir
          name: csi-data-dir

          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath

          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-plugin13.yaml #####

metadata:

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-plugin17_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpathplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpathplugin
  serviceName: csi-hostpathplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpathplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-external-health-monitor-agent:v0.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-external-health-monitor-agent
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --leader-election
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-external-health-monitor-controller:v0.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: csi-external-health-monitor-controller
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.0.1
        name: node-driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
        - mountPath: /csi-data-dir
          name: csi-data-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        - --v=5
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.4.0
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: hostpath
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: mountpoint-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: plugins-dir
        - mountPath: /csi-data-dir
          name: csi-data-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --health-port=9898
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/livenessprobe:v2.2.0
        name: liveness-probe
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccount: csi-external-health-monitor-controller
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mountpoint-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins
          type: Directory
        name: plugins-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/csi-hostpath-data/
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: csi-data-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
        name: dev-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-plugin4_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpathplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpathplugin
  serviceName: csi-hostpathplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpathplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-node-driver-registrar:v1.1.0
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - rm -rf /registration/csi-hostpath /registration/csi-hostpath-reg.sock
        name: node-driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
        - mountPath: /csi-data-dir
          name: csi-data-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        - --v=5
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/hostpathplugin:v1.2.0-rc5
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: hostpath
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: mountpoint-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: plugins-dir
        - mountPath: /csi-data-dir
          name: csi-data-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --connection-timeout=3s
        - --health-port=9898
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/livenessprobe:v1.1.0
        name: liveness-probe
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mountpoint-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins
          type: Directory
        name: plugins-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/csi-hostpath-data/
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: csi-data-dir

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin failed:

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-plugin8_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpathplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpathplugin
  serviceName: csi-hostpathplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpathplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-node-driver-registrar:v1.2.0
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - rm -rf /registration/csi-hostpath /registration/csi-hostpath-reg.sock
        name: node-driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
        - mountPath: /csi-data-dir
          name: csi-data-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        - --v=5
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --maxvolumespernode=10
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/hostpathplugin:v1.3.0-rc1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: hostpath
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: mountpoint-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: plugins-dir
        - mountPath: /csi-data-dir
          name: csi-data-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --connection-timeout=3s
        - --health-port=9898
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/livenessprobe:v1.1.0
        name: liveness-probe
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mountpoint-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins
          type: Directory
        name: plugins-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/csi-hostpath-data/
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: csi-data-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
        name: dev-dir

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpathplugin failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpathplugin
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-provisioner_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpath-provisioner
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - csi-hostpathplugin
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --connection-timeout=15s
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-provisioner:v1.4.0-rc1
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-provisioner
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---


Mutation:

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-provisioner failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-provisioner failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-provisioner1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpath-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --provisioner=csi-hostpath-v0
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --connection-timeout=15s
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-provisioner:v0.4.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-provisioner
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath-v0
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---
