##### FILE: csi-hostpath-provisioner3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: provisioner
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: provisioner
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: provisioner
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.6.3
        name: csi-provisioner
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-provisioner
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: provisioner
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: provisioner
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: provisioner
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.6.3
        name: csi-provisioner
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-provisioner
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-provisioner
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpath-provisioner
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - csi-hostpathplugin
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v2.1.1
        name: csi-provisioner
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-provisioner
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-resizer_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-resizer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpath-resizer
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpath-resizer
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-resizer
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpath-resizer
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-resizer:v0.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-resizer
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-resizer
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-resizer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: resizer
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-resizer
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-resizer
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: resizer
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-resizer
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-resizer
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: resizer
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-resizer
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - -csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-resizer:v1.9.3
        name: csi-resizer
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-resizer
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-snapshotter_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-snapshotter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-snapshotter
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-snapshotter
  serviceName: csi-snapshotter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-snapshotter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --connection-timeout=15s
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-snapshotter:v2.0.0-rc1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-snapshotter
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccount: csi-snapshotter
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-snapshotter2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-snapshotter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: snapshotter
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: snapshotter
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: snapshotter
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-snapshotter:v6.3.3
        name: csi-snapshotter
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-snapshotter
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---


Mutation:

    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: snapshotter
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
  template:

      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: snapshotter
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path

              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance

                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-snapshotter:v6.3.3

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-snapshotter4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-snapshotter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-hostpath-snapshotter
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - csi-hostpathplugin
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-snapshotter:v4.0.0
        name: csi-snapshotter
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccount: csi-snapshotter
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-testing_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        image: docker.io/alpine/socat:1.7.4.3-r0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-testing1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        image: docker.io/alpine/socat:1.7.4.3-r0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-testing10_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        command:
        - socat
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        command:
        - socat
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir

          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

    matchLabels:

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-testing15_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        command:
        - socat
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        command:
        - socat
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        command:
        - socat

        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir

      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        command:
        - socat
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-testing2_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        image: docker.io/alpine/socat:1.7.4.3-r0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        image: docker.io/alpine/socat:1.7.4.3-r0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-testing4_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        image: alpine/socat:1.0.3
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-testing5_1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        image: docker.io/alpine/socat:1.7.4.3-r0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path

    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path

                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io

        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock

        name: socat

          name: socket-dir

          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        image: docker.io/alpine/socat:1.7.4.3-r0
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-hostpath-testing9_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-hostpath-socat:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  name: csi-hostpath-socat
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
  serviceName: csi-hostpath-socat
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: socat
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: hostpath.csi.k8s.io
        app.kubernetes.io/name: csi-hostpath-socat
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: csi-driver-host-path
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/instance
                operator: In
                values:
                - hostpath.csi.k8s.io
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - tcp-listen:10000,fork,reuseaddr
        - unix-connect:/csi/csi.sock
        image: alpine/socat:1.0.3
        name: socat
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-hostpath
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-iscsiadm-config.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/openebs-jiva-csi-iscsiadm:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  iscsiadm: |
    #!/bin/sh
    if [ -x /host/sbin/iscsiadm ]; then
      chroot /host /sbin/iscsiadm "$@"
    elif [ -x /host/usr/local/sbin/iscsiadm ]; then
      chroot /host /usr/local/sbin/iscsiadm "$@"
    elif [ -x /host/bin/iscsiadm ]; then
      chroot /host /bin/iscsiadm "$@"
    elif [ -x /host/usr/local/bin/iscsiadm ]; then
      chroot /host /usr/local/bin/iscsiadm "$@"
    else
      chroot /host iscsiadm "$@"
    fi
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: openebs-jiva-csi-iscsiadm
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: csi-mock-driver.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.4.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.5.1
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - --statedir=/tmp/csi-hotpath-data
        - -v=5
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.9.0
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
        name: dev-dir

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: csi-mock-driver11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v4.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.10.0
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - --statedir=/tmp/csi-hotpath-data
        - -v=5
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
        name: dev-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-mock-driver13.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v2.1.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.1.0
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --name=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - -v=3
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/mock-driver:v4.1.0
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v4.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.10.0
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - --statedir=/tmp/csi-hotpath-data
        - -v=5
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock

      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v4.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.10.0
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - --statedir=/tmp/csi-hotpath-data
        - -v=5
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory

##### FILE: csi-mock-driver17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v4.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.10.0
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - --statedir=/tmp/csi-hotpath-data
        - -v=5
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
        name: dev-dir

        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v4.0.0

          name: socket-dir

              fieldPath: spec.nodeName

        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName

          privileged: true

          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.4.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.5.1
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - --statedir=/tmp/csi-hotpath-data
        - -v=5
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.9.0
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
        name: dev-dir

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.3.0
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - --statedir=/tmp/csi-hotpath-data
        - -v=5
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.7.3
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
        name: dev-dir

##### FILE: csi-mock-driver4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --connection-timeout=15s
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-provisioner:v1.4.0-rc1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-node-driver-registrar:v1.1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --name=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --permissive-target-path
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/mock-driver:v2.1.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: mountpoint-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mountpoint-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-mock-driver5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.3.0
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - --statedir=/tmp/csi-hotpath-data
        - -v=5
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.7.3
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
        name: dev-dir

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.4.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.5.1
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - --statedir=/tmp/csi-hotpath-data
        - -v=5
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.9.0
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
          type: Directory
        name: dev-dir

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.4.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.5.1
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --drivername=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - --endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - --statedir=/tmp/csi-hotpath-data
        - -v=5
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.9.0
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock

      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods

##### FILE: csi-mock-driver8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --connection-timeout=15s
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-provisioner:v1.4.0-rc1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-node-driver-registrar:v1.1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: driver-registrar
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --name=mock.storage.k8s.io
        - --permissive-target-path
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/mock-driver:v2.1.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mock
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: mountpoint-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mountpoint-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir

---

##### FILE: csi-mock-driver-attacher.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin-attacher:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin-attacher
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin-attacher
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin-attacher
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-attacher:v4.0.0
        name: csi-attacher
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---
