##### FILE: csi-mock-driver-attacher17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin-attacher:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin-attacher
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin-attacher
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin-attacher
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-attacher:v4.5.0
        name: csi-attacher
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin-attacher
  template:

        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-attacher:v1.1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-attacher

          privileged: true

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: csi-mock-driver-attacher8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin-attacher:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin-attacher
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin-attacher
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin-attacher
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-attacher:v1.1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-attacher
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin-attacher:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin-attacher
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin-attacher
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin-attacher
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-attacher:v3.3.0
        name: csi-attacher
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-resizer:v1.10.0
        name: csi-resizer
        securityContext:
          privileged: true

        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir

          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin-resizer
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin-resizer
  template:

      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

        - --v=5

        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-resizer:v0.5.0
        name: csi-resizer
        securityContext:

        name: csi-resizer
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin-resizer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin-resizer
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin-resizer
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin-resizer
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: quay.io/k8scsi/csi-resizer:v0.1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-resizer
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

        - --leader-election=false
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-snapshotter:v4.2.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-snapshotter
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir

        - --leader-election=false

          value: /csi/csi.sock

kind: StatefulSet
metadata:

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin-snapshotter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin-snapshotter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --leader-election=false
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-snapshotter:v4.2.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: csi-snapshotter
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:

          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate

##### FILE: csi-mock-proxy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.4.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        - --timeout=1m
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.5.1
        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - -nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - -endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - -proxy-endpoint=tcp://:9000
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.9.0
        name: mock
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: socat
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "100000"
        image: registry.k8s.io/e2e-test-images/busybox:1.29-2
        name: busybox
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir

##### FILE: csi-mock-proxy1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        - --timeout=1m
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.3.0
        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - -nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - -endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - -proxy-endpoint=tcp://:9000
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.7.3
        name: mock
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: socat
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "100000"
        image: registry.k8s.io/e2e-test-images/busybox:1.29-2
        name: busybox
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v2.1.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        - --timeout=1m
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.1.0
        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - -v=3
        - -proxy-endpoint=tcp://:9000
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/mock-driver:v4.1.0
        name: mock
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: socat
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "100000"
        image: k8s.gcr.io/busybox
        name: busybox
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir

kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v4.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock

          valueFrom:

              apiVersion: v1

        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - -nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - -endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - -proxy-endpoint=tcp://:9000
        env:

          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: mock
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: socat
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "100000"

        name: busybox

          privileged: true

          name: kubelet-csi-dir

kind: StatefulSet

  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock

        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:

        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock

              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.10.0
        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - -nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - -endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - -proxy-endpoint=tcp://:9000
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: mock
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: socat
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "100000"
        image: registry.k8s.io/e2e-test-images/busybox:1.29-2
        name: busybox
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate

##### FILE: csi-mock-proxy15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v4.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        - --timeout=1m
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.10.0
        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - -nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - -endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - -proxy-endpoint=tcp://:9000
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: mock
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: socat
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "100000"
        image: registry.k8s.io/e2e-test-images/busybox:1.29-2
        name: busybox
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.4.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        - --timeout=1m
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.5.1
        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - -nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - -endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - -proxy-endpoint=tcp://:9000
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.9.0
        name: mock
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: socat
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "100000"
        image: registry.k8s.io/e2e-test-images/busybox:1.29-2
        name: busybox
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock

kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"

        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock

        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:

        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock

          name: socket-dir

        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v3.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        - --timeout=1m
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.3.0
        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - -nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - -endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - -proxy-endpoint=tcp://:9000
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.7.3
        name: mock
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: socat
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "100000"
        image: k8s.gcr.io/e2e-test-images/busybox:1.29-1
        name: busybox
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock

        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock

          valueFrom:

              apiVersion: v1

        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - -nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - -endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - -proxy-endpoint=tcp://:9000
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1

        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir

##### FILE: csi-mock-proxy9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/csi-mockplugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: csi-mockplugin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: csi-mockplugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: csi-mockplugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(ADDRESS)
        - --feature-gates=Topology=true
        - -v=5
        - --timeout=1m
        - --default-fstype=ext4
        - --worker-threads=5
        env:
        - name: ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-provisioner:v4.0.0
        name: csi-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - args:
        - --v=5
        - --csi-address=/csi/csi.sock
        - --kubelet-registration-path=/var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock/csi.sock
        - --timeout=1m
        env:
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.10.0
        name: driver-registrar
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
        - mountPath: /registration
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - -v=5
        - -nodeid=$(KUBE_NODE_NAME)
        - -endpoint=/csi/csi.sock
        - -proxy-endpoint=tcp://:9000
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/hostpathplugin:v1.13.0
        name: mock
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: socat
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: socket-dir
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "100000"
        image: registry.k8s.io/e2e-test-images/busybox:1.29-2
        name: busybox
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          name: kubelet-pods-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          name: kubelet-csi-dir
      serviceAccountName: csi-mock
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi-mock
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: socket-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/pods
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-pods-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/csi
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: kubelet-csi-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry
          type: Directory
        name: registration-dir

---
